titleInfo.title: ‘Indiae Veteris Quatenus Macedonibus Nota Fuit Finitimarumque Regionum Specimen Geographicum’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:246 x 296, on sheet 383 x 429 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:London, published by William Faden, Geographer to the King and to the Prince of Wales, Charing Cross.Statement of responsibility:Engraved by William Palmer.Distinctive Features:Title continues: ‘Situm Ac Nomina Locorum Recentioris Aevi Sub Oculos Subjiciens Nec Non Alexandri Itinera Intra Euphratem Et Hyphasin Et Navigationem Nearchi Ab Indo Flumine Ostium Usque Pasitigris’.Relief shown by shading.Place names given in both Latin and English.Land routes shown in red; sea routes and waterways coloured green.
